document.full_text: gov. chris christie of new jersey and the republican party reimbursed the state more than $3,300 on thursday for his use of a state police helicopter for personal travel.
document.title: christie and g.o.p. repay state for helicopter flights
lines_and_colors: gov. chris christie of new jersey and the republican party reimbursed the state more than $3,300 on thursday for his use of a state police helicopter for personal travel.
